title: Something Permanent
description: It's Valentine's Day and Colin isn't sure what to do to show his partner, Rafe, that he cares. He calls in backup, in the form of his brother, Daniel, and their friends Ginger and Christopher. Even after a year together, Colin still has trouble expressing how he feelsâ€”so he has to find something that can do it for him ...*FREE Valentine's Day Short Story*
author: Roan Parrish
